title: I honestly doubt League will ever go back to a good state
body:
Because doing so would mean less income for the company, although it's the game that 99,99% of the community wants, their current business plan is what brings in the $.
It's repeating itself throughout all the major companies in the world, with the most classic example being EA. Riot simply found a business plan that makes the world go around for them, so they'll continue to do this form of business for as long as it works.

Just like how they're experimenting Lucian buffs on PBE, despite his 20% pick rate and 51% win rate.

https://i.gyazo.com/af57aac264959a056b11649c4bce9078.png

But I think most of you have already guessed why.
